title: (x) Casino/The Others/Stigmata/The Untouchables - Washington, ITC Avant Garde Gothic/Charlotte/Bodoni Condensed/Octavian
content: Stigmata was Trajan, if I recall correctly.
author: antiuser

comments.content: Those are from the posters. I think he's looking for the fonts used in the titles.

Casino: Looks like [Washington](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010234455/http:/www.philsfonts.com/detail.html?sku=URW007013DP2) with a few [Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010234455/http:/www.philsfonts.com/detail.html?sku=LI36150011P1) characters thrown in, or possibly modified characters from Washington.

Stigmata: The roman is [Octavian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010234455/http:/www.philsfonts.com/detail.html?sku=AD00031301P1), and the quasi-blackletter is [FF Koberger](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010234455/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1EI), but some of the characters (the A and I) are from a different font, or they've been redrawn.

The O, E, and Q are definitely Koberger. The T is also   
Koberger, but the curved stroke has been chewed on. The I   
looks like they took the one from Koberger but cut it in half   
and flipped a copy of the top half for the bottom. The A   
just looks made up, maybe from parts of other characters,   
but it's hard to tell.
